AttackUnit - Class in thelastpromise
This class extends the Unit class and is used to send the drawing information for the AttackUnit to its parent Unit class so it can be drawn, and to highlight the tiles that the AttackUnit can move to if it is selected.
AttackUnit(String, Location, Image) - Constructor for class thelastpromise.AttackUnit
loc is the location for the unit being passed in to be drawn texture is a texture for the image so it can be drawn This method calls the parent class of AttackUnit(Unit) and tells it to draw the unit's texture in the location it is being passed.
